title: Tressle Holiday Pop-Up Shop NYC: 12/4 - 12/6
desc:
Join  Tressle.com , the marketplace for home design, for a weekend-long Holiday Pop-Up Shop December 4th, 5th and 6th in NoLIta 
 Dates and Times: 
 Fri Dec 4 | 9am-6pm 
 Sat Dec 5 | 9am-6pm + Tressle Launch Party @ 7pm 
 Sun Dec 6 | 9am-6pm 
 Address:? Nolita Cleaning Co.,?149 Elizabeth Street New York, NY 10012 (@ Elizabeth & Kenmare) 
 Tressle's Holiday Pop-Up Shop will feature a showroom designed by  Decorist  - a top online interior design service that makes designing your home easy, fun and affordable. 
 Just like Tressle.com, the showroom will feature an eclectic mix of handcrafted pieces made by local artisans, timeless designs by emerging independent designers and the latest trends produced by household brand names - a combination of goods that has put Tressle on the interior design map fresh out of the gate this past year. 
 Stop by to shop a wide range of items from haute to handmade and enjoy a bevy of experiences that will allow you to make yourself a home for the holiday. 
 Highlights Include: 
 + Free hot cocoa & coffee served daily 
 + 20% off your next purchase when you visit 
 + Free interior design consultation (just bring a photo of your space!) 
 + An invitation to the Tressle Launch Party on Sat Dec 5th @ 7pm 
 RSVP + Visit for your chance to win a $250 Tressle gift card!
